name: Epilepsy Alliance Europe
goal:
To encourage increased EU funding for epilepsy research
To promote epilepsy awareness initiatives in Europe
To reduce the stigma associated with epilepsy in Europe
To improve standards of care for all people with epilepsy in Europe
euInitiatives:
Joint Task Force on Epilepsy in Europe of the International League Against Epilepsy and the International Bureau for Epilepsy
Celebration of International Epilepsy Day in Europe
Support to the European Advocates for Epilepsy ad hoc group in the EU Parliament
